• Observe the woman constantly for vaginal bleeding or placental delivery.
• If  there is excessive vaginal bleeding insert a second intravenous line as fluid resuscitation and attempt manual
removal of the placenta if the cervix is sufficiently open or if the placenta is partially expelled.
